title: Richard Blackwood insists Beyonce ‘never tried it on’ as he lifts lid on friendship
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Richard Blackwood and Beyonce are apparently best pals, in a friendship absolutely no one saw coming.

The former EastEnders star lifts the lid on his bond with the Single Ladies singer, during his upcoming stint on Don’t Hate The Playaz.

In a clip from the show shared exclusively with Metro.co.uk, the 47-year-old addresses claims she once ‘tried it on’ with him.

And we are honestly so shook.

Host Jordan Stephens gets straight down to it, asking him: ‘Did you get a lot of female attention back in the day? Because I heard Beyonce actually tried it on with you once.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

A flustered Richard is quick to make sure we all understand the 38-year-old never made a move on him.

‘So basically she never tried it on, I don’t know where this “tried it on” came from,’ he replied. ‘What it is, is that we’ve been friends for many years.

Richard Blackwood wants us all to know Beyonce didn’t ‘try it on’ with him (Picture: ITV2)

‘People saw a video when we did a video together, and she hugged me, and everyone went, “Rah, look at that hug!”’

We have so many questions: How and when did they meet? Has Richard met Blue Ivy? Are they in a WhatsApp chat together? Can we bag an introduction?

Blowing our minds further, he continued: ‘When I was interviewing Britney Spears, Beyonce was in the film, Austin Powers. We were that close that, when I was filming it, she made me sleep in her trailer while she was going to film.

‘That’s how close we are.’

It sounds a little less like friends, and more like Bey needed someone to take care of her trailer, hun…

Beyonce and Richard Blackwood are apparently bffs and we are shook (Picture: PA)

And Katherine Ryan took it upon herself to ask what we’re all secretly thinking.

‘Who tells that story?’ she questioned. ‘Does Beyonce tell that story? Or have only you told that story?’

But this isn’t the first time Rich has spoken about his friendship with the Drunk In Love star – previously claiming she ‘serenaded him with a song’ while performing with Destiny’s Child bandmates Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams.

Advertisement

Advertisement

*insert Sure Jan* gif here.

Katherine Ryan wasn’t quite buying his story (Picture: ITV2)

During an appearance on the Dope Black Dads podcast, the Dancing On Ice star stated she later approached him backstage, telling him: ‘You see I was singing the song to you? I was singing it to you.’

He explained that he asked her: ‘So what does that mean?’

To which she replied: ‘That’s down to you. I’ll leave it with you,’ before he added: ‘That’s all I’m going to tell of that story.’

Can someone get Beyonce on the phone because we need some answers ASAP.

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Beyonce for a comment.

Don’t Hate the Playaz airs tonight, at 10pm, on ITV2.
